name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit
reviews.reviewText: When I was shopping, the camera was only $80 cheaper than this whole package. Well worth getting all the extras and backup materials.
reviews.title: Worth the extra money

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my camera. It is perfect for me. I was happy with the bundle! I wanted a camera that I could learn more about how to use different lenses. Camera takes excellent pictures & easy to use.
reviews.title: Great Buy

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit
reviews.reviewText: Item came with everything the package had listed. Fast service and the camera works great, now I will have to relearn how to take picture in non auto mode. Great price for the camera, beats everyone else price.
reviews.title: Canon EOS

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit
reviews.reviewText: The shipping was extremely fast. Everything comes in a huge box, and everything you see in the picture above is what you'll find in that big box. This camera takes amazing pictures and it's easy to manage. I suggest reading the mini booklet to people who aren't experienced because it's very clear on how your camera works. All in all I love this camera and I recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Great Beginner Camera

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera and it was a great price as well. It came with so many items that i have not had the chance to use all the others.
reviews.title: smile
